fields.label: Layout Type
fields.name: layout_type
fields.instructions: Choose how you would like to build the portfolio entry.

sub_fields.label: Breathing room
sub_fields.name: breathing_room
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the top and bottom padding for this section.

sub_fields.label: Media Sizes for Large
sub_fields.message: Please upload at 1600px × 768px. Images taller than this will be cropped.

sub_fields.label: Media Sizes for Medium
sub_fields.message: Please upload at 1600px × 512px. Images taller than this will be cropped.

sub_fields.label: Media Sizes for Small
sub_fields.message: Please upload at 1600px × 320px. Images taller than this will be cropped.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: If Background Type is Video, this image will be used as the poster. Use the first frame of the video.

sub_fields.label: Partial Name
sub_fields.name: hero_partial_name
sub_fields.instructions: In the theme directory, we'll load /partials/sections/hero_content/%this_file%.php

sub_fields.instructions: Controls the top and bottom padding for this section.

sub_fields.label: Add padding?
sub_fields.name: has_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Space between the columns horizontally.

sub_fields.label: Is this full page?
sub_fields.name: is_full_page
sub_fields.instructions: Full-width bleed.

sub_fields.label: Are these zoomable
sub_fields.name: has_zooming
sub_fields.instructions: This will add the zooming feature on these images. Zooming doesn't work for video.

sub_fields.label: Show lead in & out?
sub_fields.name: show_lead_in_out
sub_fields.instructions: Adds WYSIWYG areas above and below this section.

sub_fields.label: Lead in content
sub_fields.name: lead_in_content
sub_fields.instructions: Content which outputs before the multi-column list content.

sub_fields.label: Size
sub_fields.name: column_span
sub_fields.instructions: Helps you create a mosiac.

sub_fields.label: Custom
sub_fields.message:
You can upload media here and consume it in the php file
/partials/sections/custom/page-slug-section-name-column-name

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: media_id
sub_fields.instructions: If this is a video, this image is used as the preload image -  use the first frame of the video if you can.

sub_fields.label: Lead out content
sub_fields.name: lead_out_content
sub_fields.instructions: Content which outputs after the multi-column list content.

sub_fields.label: Breathing room
sub_fields.name: breathing_room
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the top and bottom padding for this section.

sub_fields.name: has_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Space between the columns horizontally.

sub_fields.label: Is this full page?
sub_fields.name: is_full_page
sub_fields.instructions: Full-width bleed.

sub_fields.label: General page lists
sub_fields.name: predefined_items
sub_fields.instructions: You can use a predefined filter for this section so you don't need to choose items one at a time. If anything says "in order", that means it's using the Order number for that page. Feel free to add filters, and let the developers know there are new filters so they can code for them.

choices.team_members: Team members in order of appearance
choices.work: Work > Case Studies, Portfolio in order

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
If you want to have content here for this, enter it here - this falls back to:
Post Title
Learn more

sub_fields.label: Breathing room
sub_fields.name: breathing_room
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the top and bottom padding for this section.

sub_fields.label: Device
sub_fields.name: device_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which device you want to present upon.

sub_fields.label: Device Overflow
sub_fields.name: device_overflow
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want the bottom of the phone to fade out and create a peeking effect?

sub_fields.label: Device Color
sub_fields.name: device_color
sub_fields.instructions: If a color for a specific device doesn't exist, this will default to the most accurate color.

choices.left_device: To the left of the device
choices.right_device: To the right of the device

sub_fields.label: iPhone 5s
sub_fields.message: Upload images and videos at 658×1156 (vertical) or 1156×658 (horizontal)

sub_fields.label: iPhone 6s
sub_fields.message: Upload images and videos at 750×1254 (vertical) or 750×1254 (horizontal)

sub_fields.label: iPhone 6s+
sub_fields.message: Upload images and videos at 828×1472 (vertical) or 828×1472 (horizontal)

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: If this is a video, we're using this as the poster image before the video is loaded or playing.

sub_fields.label: Partial name
sub_fields.name: partial_name
sub_fields.instructions: In the theme directory, we'll load /partials/sections/device_content/%this_file%.php

sub_fields.label: Breathing room
sub_fields.name: breathing_room
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the top and bottom padding for this section.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.instructions: Meant for extremely tall images. It creates zoomable, long-form screenshots used to show off entire website pages. Screenshots start off at a small, cropped height and become full-height when a user clicks on them.
sub_fields.message: Meant for extremely tall images. It creates zoomable, long-form screenshots used to show off entire website pages. Screenshots start off at a small, cropped height and become full-height when a user clicks on them.

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.message: These sections annotate an area of the site which cannot be controlled through the dashboard. They are controlled through PHP within the codebase. This will include the file: /partials/sections/custom/page-slug-section-slug.php

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.message: This is meant to be used to help with sub-linking within pages. If you have a very long page that covers multiple topics, this section is meant as an anchor to change topics mid-post and allow a linkable area to scroll to. <small>This section currently does not output any HTML or have an impact on the site.</small>

fields.label: Full Custom
fields.message:
Please upload your HTML, CSS, and JS to the 'custom-portolio' folder inside /wp-content/portfolio.

Each file should follow the naming structure of: 
the-entry-name-but-lowercase-and-hyphenated.html (or .css/.js)

Be sure that each line of CSS is preceded by '.custom' in order to only target the custom part of the portfolio page (and not the AIGA Nebraska parts!).
